# pycorelib

A lightweight Python utility library ðŸš€ for everyday tasks:
- CSV parsing
- JSON safe load/dump
- Config loader (YAML)
- Async helpers
- String case converters
- File system utils
- Dictionary deep ops
- Numeric utilities
- Timer context manager

## Install
```bash
pip install pycorelib

from pycorelib import CSVReader, JSONX

print(CSVReader.read("sample.csv"))
print(JSONX.safe_load('{"a":1}'))
